title: Xbox Games Showcase 2023 Predictions - Kinda Funny Xcast Ep. 141
description:
Go to http://amazon.com/summergamefest all summer long to discover the top new & upcoming games!           

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Mike, Parris, and guest Tim Gettys share their and the audiences hopes, dreams, and predictions for the summer's biggest gaming event the Xbox Games Showcase and Starfield Direct.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:56 - Housekeeping
00:06:00 - Setting Expectations
00:11:00 - Round 1 of Predictions Locks
00:24:50 - Round 2 of Predictions Lenghty
00:33:52 - Ads
00:36:63 - Prediction Bets!
00:46:66 - Round 3 of Predictions Longshot
00:53:54 - Round 4 More Longshots

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
